name: Abysmal (niconasu)
description:
You are stuck in the Abyss. Can you escape?

Abysmal is an arcade platformer where you create your own platforms to escape while shooting down enemies that try to stop you.

Try to get to the top of that leaderboard! There's a leaderboard for both modes, so try your best to BE the best!

I made this game to test out the leaderboard functions using Lootlocker (not sponsered). I started this project 6 days ago and I'm happy with how fast I was able to make this. Please report any bugs to me in the replies or on Twitter. Thank you so much for trying out this game <3

CONTROLS

Z / A / A (gamepad) - JUMP

X / S / RT - SHOOT

Arrows / D-pad - MOVE

Down Arrow / X (gamepad) - PLACE BLOCK

F4 - FULLSCREEN

CREDITS

Game by Nico (me!)

Music by skrjablin

LPC Fireplace by Sharm Licensed CC-BY 4.0 or CC-BY 3.0

FROGBLOCK by POLYDUCKS

Space Madness by Rose Frye

Sound Effects by Subspace Audio
